suggestions.title: Offer a full glass of water now
suggestions.description: User 1002: It's 2:48 PM, and the elderly person has only consumed about 120ml of water (60% of one glass) today, with no water intake from food. For their age (77+), this puts them at increased risk of dehydration. Please immediately provide them with a full glass of water (200ml) and directly encourage them to drink it slowly. Stay with them during intake to ensure safety and adequate hydration.
